PricingProcessExecution.name: PricingProcessExecution
PricingProcessExecution.description: Represents a record generated during the execution of a discovery or pricing procedure. Multiple procedures may be performed within a single API call, with each recorded in a Pricing API Execution record.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: Available only if the multicurrency feature is enabled. Contains the ISO code for any currency allowed by the organization.

ExecutionKey.description: The unique execution ID generated each time a pricing API runs.

ExecutionType.description: The type of execution defined internally within the pricing API.

ExecutionTypeKey.description: The unique execution type ID generated internally for procedure executions, such as pricing or discovery procedures.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Message.description: The message generated upon running a pricing process.

OwnerId.description: The Salesforce ID of the sales representative who owns the pricing procedure resolution.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the execution type.
